name: Places for Everyone Joint Development Plan 2022 to 2039
organisation-name: Places for Everyone Joint Development Plan (Bolton, Bury, Manchester, Oldham, Rochdale, Salford, Tameside, Trafford, and Wigan Councils)
notes: Joint plan for 9 Greater Manchester authorities. Housing supply breakdown shows 90% of housing land is in urban area. Committed housing includes Strategic Housing Land Availability Assessment sites (brownfield and greenfield) plus small sites. Strategic allocations are specific named sites releasing Green Belt land.
